JobFullDesc: ABOUT THE ROLEUber Eats is looking for a manager to lead our SMB Account Management team in the New Verticals space, which encompasses every non-restaurant merchant. You will help grow the SMB side of the New Verticals business - consisting mostly of liquor stores, convenience stores, florists and retail stores - from the ground up.WHAT YOU'LL DO Build and manage a team of Account ManagersDevelop Account Managers to drive mutual growth for our partners and Uber Eats. You care deeply about professional development and will create a strong team cultureDevelop best-in-class, indispensable partnerships between Uber Eats and top New Verticals merchants and empower your team to be customer-obsessedDrive growth across priority business metrics such as gross bookings, active locations, merchant online rate and basket sizeFacilitate focused and productive collaboration within your team and with your cross-functional partners to deliver against your partners' goalsCollaborate closely with operations, marketing, legal and product to drive long-term growth for your partnersBe an internal and external thought-partner with leadership in regards to delivery, merchant partnerships and eater acquisitionBASIC QUALIFICATIONS4+ years of sales/account management experience in a high growth company2+ years in people managementProven history of coaching team members to develop skills and grow their careersPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSAn owner's mentality to build out a business and foster an environment of inclusion and collaborationStrong use of insights and data-driven decision making to inform the sales processExceptional written and verbal communication and organizational skillsSelf-starter and collaborative leader
